#Comments: Binding powers, to be used with basic parsers. JSON format.
Place prefix operators in RBP, postfix operators in LBP, infix
operators both in LBP and RBP. All LBP and RBP values specified here
should be integers in range 6 to 99. Operator names must not contain
whitespace, backslashes, single or double quotes.
LBP and RBP of the operator ':=' differ by more than one. See the
